trans-unit.resname: FEM·11 | Icatian Phalanx | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

trans-unit.source: {1}{W}{W}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: FEM·22a | Homarid Warrior | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {U}: CARDNAME gains shroud until end of turn and doesn't untap during your next untap step. Tap CARDNAME. (A creature with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
trans-unit.target: oU：CARDNAME不可成为咒语或效应的目标直到回合结束，且不可在你的下一个重置阶段中重置。\n横置CARDNAME。

trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；https://www.mtgsalvation.com/forums/magic-fundamentals/magic-general/547060-stupid-question-does-anyone-know-what-a-merseine

trans-unit.source: When you control no Islands, sacrifice CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 若你未操控任何海岛，则埋葬CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: You may choose not to untap CARDNAME during your untap step.
trans-unit.target: 你可选择在重置阶段中不重置CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: {T}: Gain control of target creature whose controller controls an Island for as long as you control CARDNAME and CARDNAME remains tapped.
trans-unit.target: ocT：只要你操控CARDNAME，且CARDNAME持续被横置，你便获得目标其操控者拥有海岛之生物的操控权。

trans-unit.resname: FEM·35 | Breeding Pit | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice CARDNAME unless you pay {B}{B}.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持阶段支付oBoB，否则埋葬CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: FEM·35 | Breeding Pit | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, create a 0/1 black Thrull creature token.
trans-unit.target: 在你的回合结束时，放置一个索尔兽衍生物进场，将此衍生物视为0/1黑色生物。

trans-unit.source: Black spells you cast cost {B} more to cast.
trans-unit.target: 你的黑色咒语须额外消费oB才能使用。

trans-unit.resname: FEM·39a | Initiates of the Ebon Hand | Card Name
FEM·39a | Initiates of the Ebon Hand | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}: Add {B}. If this ability has been activated four or more times this turn, sacrifice CARDNAME at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: o1：加oB到你的法术力池中。如果一回合中在此异能上的消费大于或等于o4，则在回合结束时埋葬CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: FEM·40a | Mindstab Thrull | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks and isn't blocked, you may sacrifice it. If you do, defending player discards three cards.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲CARDNAME：防御玩家选择弃掉三张牌。你只能在CARDNAME进行攻击且未被阻挡时使用此异能。

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks and isn't blocked, you may sacrifice it. If you do, destroy target creature defending player controls. It can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲CARDNAME：埋葬目标由防御玩家所操控的生物。你只能在CARDNAME进行攻击且未被阻挡时使用此异能。

trans-unit.resname: FEM·60 | Orcish Captain | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, target Orc creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. If you lose the flip, it gets -0/-2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: o1：掷一个硬币；目标对手在硬币未落下时决定正反面，若对手未猜中，目标半兽人得到+2/+0直到回合结束，否则该半兽人得到-0/-2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: FEM·92 | Bottomless Vault | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.
You may choose not to untap CARDNAME during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if CARDNAME is tapped, put a storage counter on it.
{T}, Remove any number of storage counters from CARDNAME: Add {B} for each storage counter removed this way.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进场。\n在你的重置阶段中，你可以选择不重置CARDNAME而在上面放一个储藏指示物。\nocT，从CARDNAME上移出X个储藏指示物：加X点的oB到你的法术力池中。
